comments.name: M

comments.html:
Technology diversity is a basic requirement for safety critical networks. At least as a possibility. An accepted standard for such networks must be implemented independently by multiple service providers.

It is up to the operator to make a risk assessment how much actually deployed diversity they would prefer.
comments.name: Bela Varkonyi
